name: Swing Brick
description:
I'm just a happy swinging 3d brick, swinging joyfully around in a 2d world trying to make my way to the top. It's up to you to make me swing.

Sounds easy right!

-------------------------------

Swing Brick features:

Easy and fun to play
Addictive and impossible
Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!

-------------------------------

Already a fan of Swing Brick? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:

facebook.com/HelloGossh

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Swing Brick!
